channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description:
hello just coding some donator features.
So far i have you get access to donator zone extreme donators get access to a dice bag. you can buy items which comes bundled with members. Buying non tradeable items for donator island.
Im thinking about offering a donator zone pack which then gives you access to another island for super donators. However what else would you or players look for if you were going to donate to a server?
Also what company would you recommend for hosting im going to buy a domain. but i also want databases for a forum,vote4reward and instant update donating shop. All mysql. Finally whats a good company for cheap yet effective vps that can have 100+ players at one time and is 24/7.

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @x_im_a_server_coder x im a server coder x
item.description:
@x_im_a_server_coder wrote:

hello just coding some donator features.

So far i have you get access to donator zone
extreme donators get access to a dice bag.
you can buy items which comes bundled with members.
Buying non tradeable items for donator island.

Im thinking about offering a donator zone pack which then gives you access to another island for super donators. However what else would you or players look for if you were going to donate to a server?

Also what company would you recommend for hosting im going to buy a domain. but i also want databases for a forum,vote4reward and instant update donating shop. All mysql. Finally whats a good company for cheap yet effective vps that can have 100+ players at one time and is 24/7.
